No need to: Bitcoin Core ≠ Bitcoin.
What @ ofnumbers has done here is confused Bitcoin Core with the Bitcoin protocol itself, similar to confusing Mozilla with HTTP.
The Core team writes the Bitcoin Core software, and as with all software, you want to download it from the actual devs, not imposters.
For people new to crypto, the issue here the Bitcoin Core team - an actual group of devs - is being impersonated on twitter.
